Sequence Information.Peptide Name: F4 (Rattusin central fragment 7-23, synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, homodimer with intermolecular 5S=S, UCSS2a, XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, defensin fragment, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (54.84%) toRattusinC: 29%, R: 24%, S: 12%.Activity: active against active against E. coli (MIC 15 ug/ml) and S. aureus (MIC 58 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Park G, Yun H, Min HJ, Lee CW. 2024
Literature Information.Title: A Novel Dimeric Short Peptide Derived from alpha-Defensin-Related Rattusin with Improved Antimicrobial and DNA-Binding Activities
